page.title: 16 CHURCHES IN KILWINNING
page.content: There are churches in KILWINNING to cater for people with different types of religious beliefs.All the buildings are well-maintained.{ABBEY, ERSKINE {and FERGUSHILL(linked churches ) and{MANSEFIELD are CHURCH of SCOTLAND {CHURCHES. ST.WINNING'S is a CATHOLIC {CHURCH. {The other churches are CONGREGATIONAL {belonging to the Congregational Union, { a FREE CHURCH, and a BRETHREN CHURCH {meeting in the GOSPEL HALL. All the {churches are situated close together { within easy reach of the town centre {Recently an INDEPENDENT BAPTIST CHURCH {has started to hold meetings in {PENNYBURN SCHOOL.
